title: Why Machine Learning
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Limitations of manual programming:
1. **Too complex**: Describing a face in code is impossible.
2. **Changing environments**: Spam filters need to update daily.
3. **Insights**: Discovering hidden patterns in huge data.

real_world_use_cases.description: Impossible to write manual 'if-else' rules for every face variation. ML learns features automatically.
